actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To repeal the provision of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 which provides that the accumulated earnings tax shall be applied without regard to the number of shareholders in the corporation.

summary.text: Repeals a provision of the Internal Revenue Code that subjects corporations to the accumulated earnings tax regardless of the number of shareholders.

titles.title: To repeal the provision of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 which provides that the accumulated earnings tax shall be applied without regard to the number of shareholders in the corporation.
